name: Doom Cat
description:
When the hero is busy, who will fight in their place?

Play as a cat in a shopping cart and fight demons, in this fast-paced third-person shooter on wheels! Blast a demon in its stupid face, then kickflip and drift away in style~

Made over the course of 2 days for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam - the theme was "Out of Control". My goal for this theme was to create a gameplay loop that forces the player into constant movement. Spend too much time in one place, and you'll be sent flying by a rolling demon~

Credits:

  • BGM: NES Shooter Music by SketchyLogic
  • Kitchen Assets: Ultimate House Interior Pack by Quaternius

Check back later, I'll have the project posted on github  at some point!
